attachments.text: Addressing things brought up in #11389 and beyond. TODO: reduce markdown previews of code. adjust offset encoding of parameters sent to callbacks. refactor method triggers to lsp.buf.* methods ...

attachments.fallback: A Hands-on Experience with Neovim's Builtin LSP Support
attachments.title: A Hands-on Experience with Neovim's Builtin LSP Support
attachments.text: Just a few days ago, the builtin Language Server Protocol support has been merged into Neovim master. This post is a hands-on experience of setting up LSP support for Python with the python-language-server.

text: nightlyにしてもうまくいかなかったのでissueにコメントしました。色々なビルドで試してどこが原因か調べてみたいと思います〜ありがとうございます！
